Operation 'get_/api/v1/nonprofits/list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original summary 'Search a nonprofit' is vague and singular-focused when the operation returns a list. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (which parameters are available, are they required), pagination details (how pagination works, what metadata is returned), and output structure. Enhanced version specifies the filtering mechanism, pagination support, and expected response structure to improve AI agent interpretability for determining when to use this operation and how to handle results.

data.current_description: Retrieves a list of nonprofits whose names match the provided name. This endpoint is paginated.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of nonprofits filtered by name. Accepts a name search parameter to match against nonprofit names. Returns a paginated response containing matching nonprofit records with pagination metadata (page number, total count, etc.). Supports standard pagination parameters for controlling page size and offset.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Search a nonprofit' is vague and singular-focused when the operation returns a list. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (which parameters are available, are they required), pagination details (how pagination works, what metadata is returned), and output structure. Enhanced version specifies the filtering mechanism, pagination support, and expected response structure to improve AI agent interpretability for determining when to use this operation and how to handle results.

message: Operation 'post_/api/v1/donations/create' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks clarity on required inputs (nonprofit ID, amount), expected output structure, and authentication requirements. Added specifics about what parameters are needed, what is returned, and authentication requirement for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Creates a donation to any nonprofit. CHANGE keeps track of your donations, bills you at the end of the month, and handles the nonprofit payouts for you.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a donation to a nonprofit
data.description_suggestion: Creates a donation to a specified nonprofit. The donation is tracked in your account, aggregated for monthly billing, and CHANGE handles all nonprofit payouts. Returns the created donation object with confirmation details. Requires authentication and valid nonprofit ID.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks clarity on required inputs (nonprofit ID, amount), expected output structure, and authentication requirements. Added specifics about what parameters are needed, what is returned, and authentication requirement for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/donations/show' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, vague_description. Description is too vague about what 'details' are returned and what input is required. Enhanced to specify that a donation ID is needed and clarified the response includes amount, nonprofit, date, and optional carbon impact data.

data.current_description: Retrieves the details of a donation you've previously made.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific donation by ID. Returns the donation object including amount, nonprofit recipient, creation date, and carbon offset impact if applicable. Requires authentication and valid donation ID.
data.reasoning: Description is too vague about what 'details' are returned and what input is required. Enhanced to specify that a donation ID is needed and clarified the response includes amount, nonprofit, date, and optional carbon impact data.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/donations/carbon_calculate' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is vague about the calculation output. Description is verbose and unclear about required vs optional parameters. Improved summary to clarify it calculates a donation amount, and streamlined description to clearly specify required inputs and what is returned.

data.current_description: Calculates the donation amount (to CarbonFund 501\(c\)3) needed to offset a physical shipment. This calculation depends on the weight, primary transportation method, and distance of the shipment. Provide the distance of the shipment using the origin and destination address, or directly with the number of miles. For convenience, this endpoint also returns the id of the nonprofit CarbonFund, for making a subsequent donation to. See the [Carbon offsets guide](/recipes/carbon-offsets/) for more on using this endpoint.
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate donation for shipping carbon offset
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the donation amount required to offset carbon emissions from a physical shipment to CarbonFund. Requires shipment weight, transportation method, and distance (provided as origin/destination addresses or direct mileage). Returns the calculated donation amount and CarbonFund nonprofit ID for subsequent donation creation. See Carbon offsets guide for implementation details.
data.reasoning: Summary is vague about the calculation output. Description is verbose and unclear about required vs optional parameters. Improved summary to clarify it calculates a donation amount, and streamlined description to clearly specify required inputs and what is returned.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/donations/crypto_calculate' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is vague about what is calculated. Description lacks clarity on required inputs (which 2 parameters are needed) and what the response contains. Improved summary to clarify donation amount calculation, and enhanced description to specify required parameters and response structure.

data.current_description: Calculates the donation amount (to CarbonFund 501\(c\)3) needed to offset a cryptocurrency transaction. For convenience, this endpoint also returns the id of the nonprofit CarbonFund, for making a subsequent donation to. See the [Carbon offsets guide](/recipes/carbon-offsets/) for more on using this endpoint.
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate donation for crypto carbon offset
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the donation amount required to offset carbon emissions from a cryptocurrency transaction to CarbonFund. Requires cryptocurrency type and transaction details as parameters. Returns the calculated donation amount and CarbonFund nonprofit ID for subsequent donation creation.
data.reasoning: Summary is vague about what is calculated. Description lacks clarity on required inputs (which 2 parameters are needed) and what the response contains. Improved summary to clarify donation amount calculation, and enhanced description to specify required parameters and response structure.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/donations/carbon_stats' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description explains the operation well but lacks clarity on what specific metrics are returned in the response. Enhanced to clarify the optional parameter behavior and hint at response content (impact metrics and comparisons).

data.current_description: Measures your carbon offset impact in relatable terms. Provide the id of a donation to CarbonFund to see stats about that specific donation. If you omit the donation id, this endpoint returns aggregate stats for all of your CarbonFund donations.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves carbon offset impact statistics in relatable terms. Accepts optional donation ID parameter: if provided, returns stats for that specific donation; if omitted, returns aggregate stats across all CarbonFund donations. Response includes impact metrics such as equivalent environmental comparisons.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description explains the operation well but lacks clarity on what specific metrics are returned in the response. Enhanced to clarify the optional parameter behavior and hint at response content (impact metrics and comparisons).

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/nonprofits/show' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary uses informal language ('Show') and is too generic. Description is extremely vague about what information is returned and what input is required. Improved summary to use standard REST terminology and clarified required input (nonprofit ID) and expected response content (name, mission, tax status, etc.).

data.current_description: Retrieves information for a nonprofit.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific nonprofit organization by ID. Returns nonprofit profile including name, mission, tax status, and other relevant organizational details. Requires valid nonprofit ID parameter.
data.reasoning: Summary uses informal language ('Show') and is too generic. Description is extremely vague about what information is returned and what input is required. Improved summary to use standard REST terminology and clarified required input (nonprofit ID) and expected response content (name, mission, tax status, etc.).

Operation 'get_/api/v1/nonprofits/list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original summary 'Search a nonprofit' is vague and singular-focused when the operation returns a list. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (which parameters are available, are they required), pagination details (how pagination works, what metadata is returned), and output structure. Enhanced version specifies the filtering mechanism, pagination support, and expected response structure to improve AI agent interpretability for determining when to use this operation and how to handle results.

data.current_description: Retrieves a list of nonprofits whose names match the provided name. This endpoint is paginated.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of nonprofits filtered by name. Accepts a name search parameter to match against nonprofit names. Returns a paginated response containing matching nonprofit records with pagination metadata (page number, total count, etc.). Supports standard pagination parameters for controlling page size and offset.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Search a nonprofit' is vague and singular-focused when the operation returns a list. Description lacks clarity on input parameters (which parameters are available, are they required), pagination details (how pagination works, what metadata is returned), and output structure. Enhanced version specifies the filtering mechanism, pagination support, and expected response structure to improve AI agent interpretability for determining when to use this operation and how to handle results.

message: Operation 'post_/api/v1/donations/create' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks clarity on required inputs (nonprofit ID, amount), expected output structure, and authentication requirements. Added specifics about what parameters are needed, what is returned, and authentication requirement for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Creates a donation to any nonprofit. CHANGE keeps track of your donations, bills you at the end of the month, and handles the nonprofit payouts for you.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a donation to a nonprofit
data.description_suggestion: Creates a donation to a specified nonprofit. The donation is tracked in your account, aggregated for monthly billing, and CHANGE handles all nonprofit payouts. Returns the created donation object with confirmation details. Requires authentication and valid nonprofit ID.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks clarity on required inputs (nonprofit ID, amount), expected output structure, and authentication requirements. Added specifics about what parameters are needed, what is returned, and authentication requirement for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/donations/show' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, vague_description. Description is too vague about what 'details' are returned and what input is required. Enhanced to specify that a donation ID is needed and clarified the response includes amount, nonprofit, date, and optional carbon impact data.

data.current_description: Retrieves the details of a donation you've previously made.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific donation by ID. Returns the donation object including amount, nonprofit recipient, creation date, and carbon offset impact if applicable. Requires authentication and valid donation ID.
data.reasoning: Description is too vague about what 'details' are returned and what input is required. Enhanced to specify that a donation ID is needed and clarified the response includes amount, nonprofit, date, and optional carbon impact data.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/donations/carbon_calculate' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is vague about the calculation output. Description is verbose and unclear about required vs optional parameters. Improved summary to clarify it calculates a donation amount, and streamlined description to clearly specify required inputs and what is returned.

data.current_description: Calculates the donation amount (to CarbonFund 501\(c\)3) needed to offset a physical shipment. This calculation depends on the weight, primary transportation method, and distance of the shipment. Provide the distance of the shipment using the origin and destination address, or directly with the number of miles. For convenience, this endpoint also returns the id of the nonprofit CarbonFund, for making a subsequent donation to. See the [Carbon offsets guide](/recipes/carbon-offsets/) for more on using this endpoint.
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate donation for shipping carbon offset
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the donation amount required to offset carbon emissions from a physical shipment to CarbonFund. Requires shipment weight, transportation method, and distance (provided as origin/destination addresses or direct mileage). Returns the calculated donation amount and CarbonFund nonprofit ID for subsequent donation creation. See Carbon offsets guide for implementation details.
data.reasoning: Summary is vague about the calculation output. Description is verbose and unclear about required vs optional parameters. Improved summary to clarify it calculates a donation amount, and streamlined description to clearly specify required inputs and what is returned.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/donations/crypto_calculate' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is vague about what is calculated. Description lacks clarity on required inputs (which 2 parameters are needed) and what the response contains. Improved summary to clarify donation amount calculation, and enhanced description to specify required parameters and response structure.

data.current_description: Calculates the donation amount (to CarbonFund 501\(c\)3) needed to offset a cryptocurrency transaction. For convenience, this endpoint also returns the id of the nonprofit CarbonFund, for making a subsequent donation to. See the [Carbon offsets guide](/recipes/carbon-offsets/) for more on using this endpoint.
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate donation for crypto carbon offset
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the donation amount required to offset carbon emissions from a cryptocurrency transaction to CarbonFund. Requires cryptocurrency type and transaction details as parameters. Returns the calculated donation amount and CarbonFund nonprofit ID for subsequent donation creation.
data.reasoning: Summary is vague about what is calculated. Description lacks clarity on required inputs (which 2 parameters are needed) and what the response contains. Improved summary to clarify donation amount calculation, and enhanced description to specify required parameters and response structure.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v1/donations/carbon_stats' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description explains the operation well but lacks clarity on what specific metrics are returned in the response. Enhanced to clarify the optional parameter behavior and hint at response content (impact metrics and comparisons).

data.current_description: Measures your carbon offset impact in relatable terms. Provide the id of a donation to CarbonFund to see stats about that specific donation. If you omit the donation id, this endpoint returns aggregate stats for all of your CarbonFund donations.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves carbon offset impact statistics in relatable terms. Accepts optional donation ID parameter: if provided, returns stats for that specific donation; if omitted, returns aggregate stats across all CarbonFund donations. Response includes impact metrics such as equivalent environmental comparisons.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description explains the operation well but lacks clarity on what specific metrics are returned in the response. Enhanced to clarify the optional parameter behavior and hint at response content (impact metrics and comparisons).

data.current_description: Retrieves information for a nonprofit.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific nonprofit organization by ID. Returns nonprofit profile including name, mission, tax status, and other relevant organizational details. Requires valid nonprofit ID parameter.
data.reasoning: Summary uses informal language ('Show') and is too generic. Description is extremely vague about what information is returned and what input is required.
